programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall 1
programme.desc: Having learnt where a hippos aggression comes from Steve wants to find out if we can live alongside the animal that kills up to 500 people a year. In order to see them out of the water he must come back at night.

programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes Mr Paliwal’s personal trainer for the day - by making him revamp Mrs Wicket’s garden!

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are reading Anais' dairy when they discover that her new friendship with Jodie seems a bit one-sided. Jodie has been eating Anais' lunch, taking credit for her work and making her carry her bag. Gumball decides she's a parasite, and wants to prove Anais has been brain-washed. But when Anais and Jodie become one symbiotic parasite, it's hard to tell who is the parasite and who is the host.

programme.title: Big Top Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and the gang arrive in Atlantic City for a relaxing vacation. But it's not long before they land centre stage in a three-ring mystery! After discovering there's a shuttered big top that's being hounded by werewolves, the pals go undercover to find out what's going on. It's up to Daphne the clown, Fred the trapeze artist, Velma the human rocket, Shaggy the ringmaster and Scooby-Doo the amazing trick dog to solve the mystery and save the circus. But as the number of werewolves increases, the Mystery Inc. gang starts to wonder if they're in danger of turning into the monstrous beasts themselves!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! But now they have nothing else to do. Missing the thrill of chasing Lamput, they seek to free him

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Moxie Manatee hires The Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isn’t listening to her crew.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Sylvester chases a sky-high snack. Daffy’s business feels the effects of inflation. Taz sets sail on a cargo ship… handle with care!

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings: World Tour
programme.desc: While he was falling, Grizzy performed a series of acrobatics that amazed the Lemmings.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean’s sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: This is a story of how Team Pendragon used to be.

programme.title: Lego Dc Comics Super Heroes: Justice League: Attack Of The Legion Of Doom!
programme.desc: LEGO, DC Comics and Warner Bros. Animation team up for another legendary animated adventure as the superheroes of the Justice League face off against their greatest foes.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin tries to teach the Titans valuable life lessons by reading them fairy tales, but the others co-opt his stories and spin them into their own twisted yarns.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: Cat decides that she wants to become a superhero!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebody's got to go.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Daffy offers legal advice to Elmer Fudd. Wile E. Coyote goes full throttle to catch Road Runner.

programme.title: All-Star Superman
programme.desc: Fuelled by hatred and jealousy, Lex Luthor masterminds a plot to kill the Man of Steel. Poisoned by solar radiation, Superman is dying.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: When Clarence discovers a new quirk about his friend, Jeff begs Clarence not to tell. Can Clarence resist the urge to expose Jeff's secret to the entire school?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Cyborg and Beast Boy face-off to decide which is better, burgers or burritos.

programme.title: Hero Inside
programme.desc: Mike and Lucy defeat villains to commit a crime with Chamely using the ability of a chameleon. However, the police and citizens treat all Hero Book readers as criminals.

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: Ben completely ignores Gwen when she takes him to a family fun center, while Frightwig pushes Zombozo back into a life of crime.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: In order to find Finn's father, Finn and Jake must commit a cosmic crime...Unless the Lich beats them to it!

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven goes into his room in the temple to look for answers.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby try to seize an opportunity to eat a piece of cake, and it comes when they learn that Skips' birthday is coming soon.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: The gang's costumes accidentally shrink as they head out to Mr Fugu's fruit-themed party.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: A hungry Big Foot turns up at the farm. Courage is terrified at first but befriends the gentle monster and must save him from the Farmer and an angry mob.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Tired of Mordecai always beating him at punchies and getting his way, Rigby decides to learn the martial art of "Death Kwon Do".

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: When Mung ruins his tongue, he must rely on Chowder as his taster.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: The Farmer goes to visit his mother on Mother's Day, taking a reluctant Courage along with him.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. One button, and there's light! Another button surveys the house's nooks and crannies. Grizzy will finally be able to rid himself of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch! But beware of losing control...

programme.desc: A woman calls 911 while her family is held hostage by armed home invaders. Police rush to rescue a woman trapped in her burning car. A kidnapper tries to steal a mother's young children at a gas station.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devonte's gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A bodybuilder tries to bolt from the courtroom; an angry judge hits a handcuffed defendant; a courthouse sucker-puncher; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A handcuffed defendant attacks her lawyer; a sex offender's mom takes offense at his bail hearing; a judge dresses down a panty thief; and more.

programme.desc: In Dallas, a woman is brutally attacked and killed in her home; in Memphis, a longtime investigator needs to convince a reluctant witness to give up the triggerman in a shooting.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A paranormal investigative team is stunned by an unsettling capture on their thermal imaging camera. A mother and daughter are profoundly moved by a particularly beautiful UFO sighting.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch play Scooch’s favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks it’s time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When there’s a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like “Piper” can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song “just for them”, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves… and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: There’s a new “babblist” in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh throws a slumber party to take his friendship game to the next level with Tip's classmates/Kyle will do whatever it takes to keep Oh accident-free.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When the Dinotrux settle together in the crater, D-Structs decides to go after their most important resource: the Reptools.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.desc: Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. programme.title: Dinotrux

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Growing Up Grizzly: A Tale Of Two Orphans
programme.desc: After 18 years of raising an orphaned bear named Brutus, Casey Anderson will do anything to ensure no bears have to live in a man made sanctuary. His resolve is put to the test one year when he is notified of 2 recently orphaned grizzly cubs.

programme.title: Laws Of The Lizard
programme.desc: Meet the creature that scientists believe is the key to the story of life and how it evolves: the anole.

programme.title: Islands Of Creation
programme.desc: In the jungles of a remote archipelago in the South Pacific, a biologist is attempting to do something Charles Darwin and Ernst Mayr never accomplished: catch evolution in the act of creating new species. Albert Uy is on the verge of an amazing discovery in the Solomon Islands, but there's a threat looming on the horizon.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: The Hunt For Eagle 56
programme.desc: After finding the bow of Eagle 56 at the bottom of the Atlantic, civilian investigators search for the rest of the ship to understand its mysteries. Follow the hunt for the missing engine room as they hope to change the Navy’s version of the tragedy.

programme.title: The Hunt For Eagle 56
programme.desc: Join the race against time as the team hunts for the sunken Eagle 56 boilers before winter sets in so they can finally reveal discoveries to the Navy and the families of the warship’s crew.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Uncover the bizarre demise of the world’s most famous magician. Watch experts recreate Houdini’s legendary escapes to determine whether his death was accidental, or if he was the victim of a powerful group that wanted him dead.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Uncover the details behind the death of the world’s most powerful drug lord. Examine new documents, videotapes, and an interview with Escobar’s son to reveal who fired the fatal shot when Escobar went down in a hail of bullets.

programme.title: Tom Hanks: The Nomad
programme.desc: From humble beginnings to an aspiring thespian to acting as some of the world’s most iconic and notable characters. He has picked up a reputation as ‘America’s Nice Guy’, ’The Everyman’ and a nomad of the arts. But we all know him… as Tom Hanks.

programme.title: Kate Winslet: Leading Lady
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Kate Winslet, known for Titanic, is celebrated for her versatile, intense performances in both Hollywood blockbusters and indie films, cementing her as one of the finest actors of her generation.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Bruce Willis: All American Hero
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.desc: He may be one of the sexiest Hollywood actors, but his career and personal goals offer much more than his looks. Brad Pitt. One of the leading names in all of Hollywood. The well-known story of an unknown talent who transformed into a superstar.

programme.title: Snow White's Revenge
programme.desc: A mystery romance with a woman who wanted to have the world and a woman who risked everything for revenge.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: The Daughter I Gave Away

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DEEPER LOOK
programme.desc: An experienced anchor Del Irani has a cutting-edge dialogue with a first-class guest on a current-affairs topics.

programme.title: Dig More Japan
programme.desc: Whether it's self-sufficient living or preserving an old home, there are people in Japan who've found ways to give their daily lives more meaning. We dig a little deeper.

programme.title: Dining With the Chef mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: Tomato Nikudofu Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Dive in Tokyo
programme.desc: Hino in western Tokyo is known for irrigation canals and its past as a rice cultivating center during the Edo period. The fertile lands gave rise to the men who would form the legendary Shinsengumi.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.

programme.title: The Invasion / Prank Day
programme.desc: Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. // Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt
programme.desc: What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline
programme.desc: The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom
programme.desc: Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicuña who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: The Trophy Chase
programme.desc: The Championship Race is about to start, and all the fastest trucks in town are ready to roll! But when Crusher steals the trophy before the race even begins, it's up to Blaze and his friends to get it back in time.

programme.title: Cinnamon Buns / Soufflé
programme.desc: For Chef's birthday, Chef and Olly follow clues on a journey that leads to a delicious surprise. // When a rumor spreads that Chef can't make a soufflé, he is determined to show he can.

programme.title: Dennis Drones On
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Sharkdog Sitting
programme.desc: While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Fish Fiesta Freakout
programme.desc: Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma
programme.desc: When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Lannie's Lights
programme.desc: When another fishy tells Lannie that her lantern shark lights are too bright, she tries to dim her shine.

programme.title: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast
programme.desc: It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants
programme.desc: Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Hair Salon / The Crew Builds A Colorful Crystal Show
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build a hair salon just in time for Grandpa Gravel's special photo-until they run into a squirrely shampoo setback! / Motor and Lily make a shiny discovery worth celebrating... with the coolest light show the pups have ever seen!

programme.title: The Toy Cupboard
programme.desc: Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Pen Pal
programme.desc: Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Granny and Granpa's Attic
programme.desc: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: School Camp
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelle’s tent

programme.title: The Nap
programme.desc: Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: The Bicycle
programme.desc: Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Cinnamon Buns / Soufflé
programme.desc: For Chef's birthday, Chef and Olly follow clues on a journey that leads to a delicious surprise. // When a rumor spreads that Chef can't make a soufflé, he is determined to show he can.

programme.title: Quesadillas
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: Trouble at the Truck Wash
programme.desc: When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: The Fastest of them All
programme.desc: When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost
programme.desc: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Pups Save a Giant Plant
programme.desc: Buddy - Mayor Goodway’s gesture of goodwill gift grows wildly out of control when it’s planted in the wrong place. Time for a transplant!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway
programme.desc: It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline
programme.desc: The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Tio Tesoro's Treasure / The Great Key Mystery
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Map help Tío Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again. // Dora and Boots investigate a mysterious key so they can discover more about Dora's great-great grandma, the first exploradora.

programme.title: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks
programme.desc: When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: No Fishes in This School
programme.desc: It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Going Wild
programme.desc: When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: A Not So Grand Opening
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: The Toy Cupboard
programme.desc: Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Captain Daddy Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: The Quarrel
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Bouncy Ball
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Cinnamon Buns / Soufflé
programme.desc: For Chef's birthday, Chef and Olly follow clues on a journey that leads to a delicious surprise. // When a rumor spreads that Chef can't make a soufflé, he is determined to show he can.

programme.title: The Puppet / Gloop Gloop Ah-Ah
programme.desc: The Barbababies decide to create a show and go all out! // Barbotine wants to create the best lemonade.

programme.title: Living Together / Holey The Snowman
programme.desc: For the very first time, the Barbababies will take the train and sleep in a hotel. // Barbouille crafted a magnificent snowman that the children named Bobo.

programme.title: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training
programme.desc: The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Video Game Heroes
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium

programme.title: Pups Save Luke Stars / Pups Save Chicken Day
programme.desc: Katie is going to perform her contest-winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay. // Chickaletta goes missing on Chicken Day! The PAW Patrol have to find her to save the festivites.

programme.title: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo
programme.desc: Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it! // Bip Bip has a concert with Tico, but he's lost! Dora and Boots have to get him to the show on time.

programme.title: Vandal! / Tumbles, Where Did You Go?
programme.desc: Barbidur catches a mysterious masked vandal. // Tototutu, Barbidur's favorite little car, has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Crowns & Castles / The Great Mondini
programme.desc: The hamsters overhear Dad role-playing as a dastardly knight and believe he has turned evil. // Mondo must choose between superhero life and saving his best friend at Harry's magic show.

programme.title: Cattle Drive
programme.desc: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.

programme.title: Space Alien Adventure!
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormy's jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf
programme.desc: When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Pups Raise the Paw Patroller
programme.desc: Daring Danny’s at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor
programme.desc: Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge
programme.desc: After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito
programme.desc: Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album. // Dora and Boots help a baby parrot named Lorito find his Mami, but he can't stop copying Boots!

programme.title: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon
programme.desc: It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: The Fast and The Fishy
programme.desc: Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Air Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Stars
programme.desc: It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Work and Play
programme.desc: When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: The Rainbow
programme.desc: Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Pedro's Cough
programme.desc: Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Fwendsgiving Feast / Blueberry Crumble

programme.title: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two survivors of a bus crash awake to discover that they are the only people left in the town, they must work together to unveil the truth behind their isolation. As terrifying events unfold, nothing really is as it seems…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Retour Au Pays
programme.desc: It's finally time for our three hopefuls to say farewell. The moment has come for them to set off for their new life. And for everyone, this long-awaited moment suddenly becomes solemn as they realise they are about to turn an important page in their lives.

programme.title: Terra Artistika

programme.title: Salle Des Profs

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix arrives amongst the Wonderfolk and learns that Hare has been offered a place at Grand Master Banjo's school. Hatter is worried about losing his friend.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.desc: ''Temps Présent'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres À Arles
programme.desc: Arles amphitheatre is buzzing with excitement as the queen of the town is about to be named! But she doesn't come forward after her name is announced. A corpse is found instead of her in the royal carriage: the corpse of the election organiser.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: The smartphone is at the heart of stakes of sovereignty, security and technological control between the American and Chinese giants. At the centre of this battle, the market of semi-conductors, essential components of electronic objects, is dominated by Taiwan, ally of Washington and Beijing's target.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: Whether summer or winter, Savoie is always a land of excellence. We meet Fombonne-Rouvier, town planner; René and Maxime Meilleur, chefs at a three Michelin-starred restaurant; Klébert Silvestre, bee-keeper, Nicolas Mathieu, crozet-producer and mountain guide; Pascale Vidonne, in charge of heritage in Bourg-Saint-Maurice, notably responsible for its Baroque chapels.

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: Alex/Marina discovers the joy of having a family and a loving mother, making her little sister Éléonore very jealous. She decides to become Marina for good and breaks off with Maël, the friend she'd been through so much with. But Laurent thinks she's lying and secretly requests another DNA test...

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: An anonymous writer threatens to denounce Alex/Marina if she doesn't obey his orders. Éléonore has a new boyfriend: Maël, who has hidden his real identity from her. The police discover that Ivan Claes was innocent. Marina's murderer is manipulating them from the shadows, close nearby.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Encounter with Julien des Monstiers both in his studio at the Château de Chambord and at a magisterial solo exhibition. Dragons and other extraordinary creatures populate a world beyond contemporary conventions.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2

programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90's Korea.

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Bagets 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The Bagets were back bringing with them their new friends for merrier and wackier adventures. This time around, the boys went to the province for their vacation and found loads to laugh about, cry about, be scared about, be sick about, just about everything you could think of.

programme.title: Lumaban Ka… Sagot Kita
programme.desc: Linette (Cherie Pie Picache) is an active student leader. She is frustrated that her boyfriend Dado (Julio Diaz) is apathetic towards the situation. But this will soon change.

programme.title: Paracale Gang
programme.desc: Jay Manalo topbilled this action flick about six burly youngsters who would stop at nothing to redeem their once serene home. Complicating the buy off was not the price however. A villanous government official wanted to see them dead after the deal.

programme.title: Estudyante Blues
programme.desc: The hit song by well-known folk singer, Freddie Aguilar, "Anak", was the basis for this light-hearted tale about campus life. Escapades of eight young men who were classmates in school but who also had to deal with their personal problems.

programme.title: Pandoy... Alalay Ni Panday
programme.desc: In Pandoy, Joey De Leon gave a comic twist to the popular "Panday," a fictional action hero popularized by the King himself, Fernando Poe, Jr.

programme.title: Do Re Mi
programme.desc: Donna, Regine and Mikee had one thing in common. They were all dreaming of success as singing stars. Duped by an illegal job recruiter, who promised them a stint in Japan, they decided to strike out on their own by putting up a restaurant where they could also perform.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin Part 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: Psycho Sex Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. And the victims have one thing in common --- they are all in the care of the same psychiatrist.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Magkapalad
programme.desc: In a world dictated by greed and lawlessness, two hearts find each other and fall in love.

programme.title: Kumander Lawin
programme.desc: Action star Dante Varona is Renato Solidum, a peace-loving farmer. When his whole family is killed by the town Mayor's henchmen, he joins a band of insurgents. As Kumander Lawin, he emerges as the nemesis of merciless outlaws and corrupt government officials.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 14
programme.desc: When Detective Bailey's sister, Jess (ALISHA WAINWRIGHT), runs into trouble with the law, Bailey must decide how far she's willing to go to protect her family.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 10
programme.desc: The epic series finale. The Kents fight with everything they have as Luthor makes his final move on Smallville.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 7
programme.desc: After flying to Ohio to check on his car dealership – and burgeoning RV and Airstream business – Mark prepares to test his faith-based film in front of an audience for the first time.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 8
programme.desc: Mark rallies Flecha Azul's marketing team ahead of their big launch, shores up a deal to expand Wahlburgers.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 22
programme.desc: Lori and Brandon get in a fight over a bin and make a wager to see who can do better. Lori eyes a bin with a tanning bed, while a bin with fake walls intrigues Brandon. Meanwhile, Papa Bear and Jesse vie for a bin full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys put their green thumbs to the test as workers in a garden center, demonstrate how NOT to save lives as CPR instructors, and they're full of baloney workinga deli counter.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.
